description: Create a `*.cy.ts` file for Cypress component testing for an Angular component.

project.description: The name of the project where the component is located.
project.x-prompt: What project is the component located in?

componentName.description: Class name of the component to create a test for.
componentName.x-prompt: What is the class name of the component to create a test for?

componentDir.description: Relative path to the folder that contains the component from the project root.
componentDir.x-prompt: What is the path to the component directory from the project root?

componentFileName.description: File name that contains the component without the `.ts` extension.
componentFileName.x-prompt: What is the file name that contains the component?
